column4: hi ppl, can anyone give me a hand on configuring a php server?

thats it
ok im kind of noob on ubuntu or any other linux, love it but never bother mutch on learning it,so cut me some slack and walk with me a bit on this one
ok ftp
where should i start
either in the command line or with an FTP client like Filezilla
you using Filezilla?
is SSH configured on your Ubuntu comp?
you most likely don't have remote access enabled yet
go onto your ubuntu machine yourself and install openssh-server
go to your Ubuntu comp.  Open a terminal window.  Type: sudo apt-get install openssh-server
then reboot
then reboot the Ubuntu computer
then try to remote in
using the SFTP method on Filezilla
you owe me NOTHING (I would take the beer and give it to someone else anyways :P)
